description: VMware vSphere Dashboard using the new Telegraf plugin

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m), "source"
SELECT last("usagemhz_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT last("active_average") FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE ("clustername" =~ /^$clustername$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_latest") * (100 / mean("capacity_latest"))  FROM "vsphere_datastore_disk" WHERE ("source" = '$datastore') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_average") FROM "vsphere_host_cpu" WHERE "esxhostname" = ($esxi) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(none)
SELECT mean("ready_summation") FROM "vsphere_vm_cpu" WHERE ("vmname" =~ /^$virtualmachine$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "vmname" fill(none)
